TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TemplateControlParser extends System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser
Public MustInherit Class TemplateControlParser Inherits BaseTemplateParser
public ref class TemplateControlParser abstract : System::Web::UI::BaseTemplateParser

Docs.summary: Implements ASP.NET template parsing for template controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControlParser> class provides parser functionality for the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> class. Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> class include the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> classes. Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControlParser> class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly.
